long_description: The ENO SlackWire Slackline kit is easy to transport and quick to set up so you can slackline at the park, in the backyard or around the campsite. Set the slackline up between 2 trees and have fun challenging your balance and core strength. 2-in.-wide nylon webbing is bit more stable and taut than a traditional 1-in.-wide slackline. Integrated ratchet lets you set the tension just right; keep the line loose for lots of bounce or tighten it up for more stability. ENO SlackWire Slackline kit includes a carrying case.
short_description: The ENO SlackWire Slackline kit is easy to transport and quick to set up so you can slackline at the park, in the backyard or around the campsite.
